name: Aries
description: As the first sign, Aries is a Cardinal Fire sign known for initiating action. Ruled by Mars, they are natural leaders who thrive on challenge and momentum, approaching life with boldness and competitiveness. Their strengths include courage, decisiveness, and drive; their challenges include impatience, a quick temper, and acting before thinking.

name: Taurus
description: Taurus is a Fixed Earth sign ruled by Venus, with a deep appreciation for comfort, beauty, and material security. Steadfast and loyal, they value consistency and build patiently over time. Their strengths are reliability, endurance, and sensuality; their challenges include stubbornness, resistance to change, and occasional possessiveness.

name: Gemini
description: Gemini is a Mutable Air sign represented by the Twins and ruled by Mercury. They are curious communicators who thrive on variety, ideas, and social exchange. Their strengths include adaptability, mental agility, and wit; their challenges include scattered attention, overthinking, and occasional indecisiveness.

name: Cancer
description: Cancer is a Cardinal Water sign ruled by the Moon. Deeply sensitive and home-oriented, they care fiercely for loved ones and possess powerful intuition. Their strengths are empathy, protectiveness, and emotional depth; their challenges include moodiness, defensiveness, and retreating into their shell when overwhelmed.

name: Leo
description: Leo is a Fixed Fire sign ruled by the Sun, radiating confidence, warmth, and vitality. Creative and proud, they thrive when expressing themselves and often take the spotlight with natural leadership. Their strengths include loyalty, courage, and generosity; their challenges include pride, a need for validation, and occasional dramatics.

name: Virgo
description: Virgo is a Mutable Earth sign ruled by Mercury, focused on service, craft, and practical excellence. Meticulous and organized, they bring clarity and refinement to complex tasks. Their strengths are diligence, discernment, and humility; their challenges include perfectionism, overcritical tendencies, and overthinking.

name: Libra
description: Libra is a Cardinal Air sign ruled by Venus, striving for balance, beauty, and partnership. Charming and diplomatic, they excel at mediation and seeing multiple perspectives. Their strengths include fairness, sociability, and tact; their challenges include indecision and people-pleasing to avoid conflict.

name: Scorpio
description: Scorpio is a Fixed Water sign traditionally ruled by Mars and in modern astrology by Pluto. Profoundly perceptive, they seek truth, emotional depth, and transformation. Their strengths include resilience, focus, and loyalty; their challenges include secrecy, jealousy, and intensity that can become consuming.

name: Sagittarius
description: Sagittarius is a Mutable Fire sign ruled by Jupiter, driven by adventure, learning, and truth-seeking. Visionary and spirited, they are natural explorers who broaden horizons—literally and philosophically. Their strengths include optimism, generosity, and big-picture thinking; their challenges include restlessness, overpromising, and tactless honesty.

name: Capricorn
description: Capricorn is a Cardinal Earth sign ruled by Saturn, focused on mastery, structure, and long-term achievement. Disciplined and pragmatic, they lead through example and strategic planning. Their strengths include responsibility, resilience, and resourcefulness; their challenges include rigidity, workaholism, and a guarded emotional style.

name: Aquarius
description: Aquarius is a Fixed Air sign traditionally ruled by Saturn and in modern astrology by Uranus. Progressive and unconventional, they champion innovation, community, and systems change. Their strengths include originality, objectivity, and humanitarian vision; their challenges include aloofness, contrarianism, and emotional detachment.

name: Pisces
description: Pisces is a Mutable Water sign traditionally ruled by Jupiter and in modern astrology by Neptune. Imaginative and compassionate, they sense the unseen and connect through feeling and artistry. Their strengths include empathy, creativity, and spiritual insight; their challenges include escapism, porous boundaries, and absorbing others’ emotions.
